entry.title: $2400 // 2 bedroom in Bushwick ♦♦ Prime is big, modern, bright
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 4295

2 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle Av. Nestled in a new development this 2 bedroom in Bushwick Prime is big, modern, bright, elegant and clean. Featuring two equal sized bedrooms and a generous living room space. Plus, a modern kitchen and sleek bathroom. Very nice condo-like building w/laundry room and gorgeous roof space. 5 minutes from the J, M, Z @ Myrtle/Bway and near all the cute cafe's and spots that have opened up in the Neighb. Very well priced for space/quality & location.

AMENITIES
High Ceilings
Video Intercom
Laundry in building
Outdoor Space
Roof access
Stainless Steel Appliances
Granite countertops
Private parking

entry.title: $2350 // Stainless steel +++appliances including dishwasher and microwave.
entry.content:
2 Bed / 2 Bath on St Nicholas Ave in Bushwick, Brooklyn. No Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: DeKalb Av. True 2 bedroom, 2 full bath just a few blocks from the Jefferson L train! Large bedrooms with enough room for queen sized beds and all your other furniture! Rooms on opposite sides of the apartment and each room has a private entrance. Separate living room and separate kitchen! Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave. Prime Bushwick! This one is dope!


Move in Costs: First and Security
Credit: Healthy
Available:Now
Fee: No Fee

Contact Me directly at 347 56 955 0 Three to schedule an appointment
